# Intervals for the switch-off probability functions during occupation in function of the indoor illuminanace
# rows: different room types 
# (1) Bathroom, (2) Bedroom, (3) Hallway, (4) Kitchen, (5) Living, (6) Office, (7) Toilet, Storage and (8) LivingKitchen
# columns: interval in which the switch-off probability function during presence should be located. 
# (1) lower function and (2) upper function
